overview: Inside an apartment, a character describes the birth of two children: a boy and a girl. In the maternity ward, the first is received with pride by the father. The girl, on the other hand, is welcomed by her mother's distressed gaze. While the boy grows up as a man, the girl does not identify with the skirts she is wearing. This fictional documentary about the differences and closeness between two siblings touches on themes such as transsexuality, love, violence and discovery.
title: Filho Homem
